mapper.select: SELECT cess.section_seq,cess.subject_seq,ces.subject_name,cess.score, TRUNCATE(( ( cess.score - cea.avg ) / cea.standard_deviation ) * ( ces.max_score / 5 ) + ces.max_score, 0) AS standard_score,cerc.rating_code FROM csat_exam_student_score cess INNER JOIN csat_exam_subject ces ON cess.csat_seq = ces.csat_seq AND cess.exam_seq = ces.exam_seq AND cess.section_seq = ces.section_seq AND cess.subject_seq = ces.subject_seq INNER JOIN csat_exam_avg cea ON cess.csat_seq = cea.csat_seq AND cess.exam_seq = cea.exam_seq AND cess.section_seq = cea.section_seq AND cess.subject_seq = cea.subject_seq INNER JOIN (SELECT cerc1.csat_seq,cerc1.rating_code,cerc1.exam_seq,cerc1.section_seq, cerc1.subject_seq,cerc1.raw_score AS min_raw_score, IFNULL(cerc2.raw_score, ces.max_score + 1) AS max_raw_score FROM csat_exam_rating_cut cerc1 LEFT OUTER JOIN csat_exam_rating_cut cerc2 ON cerc1.csat_seq = cerc2.csat_seq AND cerc1.exam_seq = cerc2.exam_seq AND cerc1.section_seq = cerc2.section_seq AND cerc1.subject_seq = cerc2.subject_seq AND cerc1.rating_code = cerc2.rating_code + 1 INNER JOIN csat_exam_subject ces ON cerc1.csat_seq = ces.csat_seq AND cerc1.exam_seq = ces.exam_seq AND cerc1.section_seq = ces.section_seq AND cerc1.subject_seq = ces.subject_seq WHERE cerc1.csat_seq = #{csatSequence} AND cerc1.exam_seq = #{examSequence}) cerc ON cess.csat_seq = cerc.csat_seq AND cess.exam_seq = cerc.exam_seq AND cess.section_seq = cerc.section_seq AND cess.subject_seq = cerc.subject_seq AND cess.score >= cerc.min_raw_score AND cess.score < cerc.max_raw_score WHERE cess.csat_seq = #{csatSequence} AND cess.exam_seq = #{examSequence} AND cess.student_seq = #{studentSequence}
